mapper.insert: insert into tc_course_syllabus ( id, course_id, teacher_id, day, begin_time, end_time, note, date_created, create_id, create_ip, last_updated, del_flag, version, course_status, detail_info ) values ( #{id}, #{course_id}, #{teacher_id}, #{day}, #{begin_time}, #{end_time}, #{note}, now(), #{create_id}, #{create_ip}, now(), '0', 0, '0', #{detail_info} )
mapper.select: select count(0) from tc_course_syllabus where id=#{id}

select
, t2.title from tc_course_syllabus t1 left join tc_course t2 on (t1.course_id=t2.id) where 1=1
and t1.del_flag=#{del_flag}
and t1.del_flag='0'
and t1.course_status=#{course_status} order by t1.day asc
